item.title: Virtus - Grand Exchange - Party Room - Zombies - Stable
item.dc:creator: @I_InDrEk_I I InDrEk I
item.description:
@I_InDrEk_I wrote:

[quote=“g0d of war1, post:17, topic:551381”]lol he thought he was gonna get famous off it or wanted more feedback, lol he didn’t do much to this no point of the release lmao[/quote]What the fuck… Go and download the “Original Epicurus” and see for yourself that it does not have the following stuff. And the reason for releasing this was not to get “famous” lol.

Almost all skills rewritten Tormented demons Frost dragons enchanting 602 npcs hd minimap pk tournament area level 99 announcements toyhorses skilling tasks zombies minigame warriors guild server toggle panel interface security system to prevent dupes clipped combat & following npc clipping server sided maps loaded projectile clipping autoban for thieving random fail fixed tons of crashes fixed all dupes(not released) and exploits client loader php highscores script fixed packet exloits PvM stats

Read full topic

i have the client folder but theres nothing in there to run the actual client ?
[/quote]Setup the client with eclipse and run it.

How you setup the client with eclipse?[/quote]You simply create a new project on your workspace and browse for the client folder and if it is added correctly then you’re able to run it from the green play button.

item.title: Virtus - Grand Exchange - Party Room - Zombies - Stable
item.dc:creator: @I_InDrEk_I I InDrEk I
item.description:
@I_InDrEk_I wrote:

g0d of war1:

what did you really do that wasn’t already added in this lol? yes you stated what you have done to it but when Epicurus was released there wasnt much to rewrite

The original epicurus release is bullcrap… It uses normal PI skills, it has no clipping and it’s full of packet exploits, dupes & crashes.

This is the list of the stuff that I’ve done:

Almost all skills rewritten Tormented demons Frost dragons enchanting 602 npcs hd minimap pk tournament area level 99 announcements toyhorses skilling tasks zombies minigame warriors guild server toggle panel interface security system to prevent dupes clipped combat & following npc clipping server sided maps loaded projectile clipping autoban for thieving random fail fixed tons of crashes fixed all dupes(not released) and exploits client loader php highscores script fixed packet exloits PvM stats

Read full topic

item.title: Virtus - Grand Exchange - Party Room - Zombies - Stable
item.dc:creator: @I_InDrEk_I I InDrEk I
item.description:
@I_InDrEk_I wrote:

[quote=“Soulcist, post:2, topic:551381”]You’re showing off pretty generic stuff from the media, nothing that would want me to come online and play. I’m not sure about this one, but I suppose it wouldn’t be bad for someone to download and play with (and then those who want to turn this into something).[/quote]For a fact, this has little to no bugs and it’s ready to host and it’s easy to manage. You can just download it and throw your unique stuff in. I’m not too creative person so that’s why there’s no unique stuff :L

Read full topic
